definitions.definition: A branch of pharmacology concerned with the rate at which drugs are absorbed , distributed , metabolized , and eliminated by the body.
The particular rates at which drugs are absorbed , distributed , metabolized , and eliminated by the body.

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A branch of pharmacology concerned with the rate at which drugs are absorbed , distributed , metabolized , and eliminated by the body.
secondary_definitions: ( pharmacology ) The particular rates at which drugs are absorbed , distributed , metabolized , and eliminated by the body.
